name: Endless Hero Runner
description:
A great jumping game. You can control the left and right to make the jump and sliding to avoid all obstaclesand over obstacles.

Playing with friends will become more interesting.


Endless Hero Runner is an endless running game in which your goal is to be faster than the actual setting for achieving your goals. Overcome all obstacles that appear and be the winner.
The game is quite fun to offer a fairly mind-blowing gaming , full of challenges. The more you run , the greater your chances of getting further . But be careful because the race is long and in the end it's just you against yourself .

Endless Hero Runner as the name implies , is an endless game where you have to be very quick to avoid being swallowed by the scenario itself . As you progress , you have to run to overcome all obstacles and do not fall by the wayside .

In the game , you have to move your character jumping and sliding on all objects that are in front .
